name: Breakout Legends (LDMini67)
description:
For the LDMini67, the challenge was to remix or mashup classic games. For this challenge, I gave an ARPG remix to the classic game Breakout.

A remix of the classic Breakout; this game brings in Action RPG elements to the original game. In this new remix, you'll have to defeat enemies along the way. There are a few different types that attack or defend differently, so you'll have to be on your toes! When the special meter is full, unleash a powerful attack on your opponents, or gain back some health!

Default Controls: ASWD: move. Space:Fire. Escape: quit.
UI Looks best in 16:9 resolution
Music credits go to Visager.
